title: Ticket #196: Add documentation for Condor's GLExec support
description:
From the RUST ticket: 

Dear Condor team.

Looking thorough the documentation, I cannot find any information on how
to configure the Condor gLExec interaction.

gLExec is mentioned in the release history, but nowhere else in the
documentation.

Can you please add a gLExec section?

Thanks,
  Igor
remarks:
2009-Mar-03 13:19:17 by gquinn:
Documentation for GLExec mode has been added to the 7.2.1 manual.
creator: gquinn
